pages.text:
Event Venues .entry-header Are you looking for a special and unique location for your meeting, conference or reception? We have been hosting events for over 20 years. With 2 banquet rooms to choose from, we have everything you need.
Cord Banquet Hall
Cross Creek Banquet Room
Duesenberg Banquet Hall Tucker Banquet Room
The Auburn Banquet Room
The Lafayette Banquet Room
The Duesenberg Banquet Hall displays the same luxury and grand style as the Duesenberg car represents.  Our 15,000 sq. ft., state-of-the-art banquet hall with beautiful décor throughout will help make your event the best ever!  Amenities include a stage, 9 X 12 backlit projection, sound system, recessed lighting, dance floor, and 8 flat screen televisions.  This room provides seating for up to 900 at tables or 1,500 using a theater seating layout.  **Full room $3,500* + options   $500 Security/Damage Deposit The Auburn Banquet Room and the Tucker Banquet Room are located on the top floor of the Museum.  These 2,500 sq. ft. rooms are glass-enclosed on three sides, from floor to ceiling, displaying views of the museum property.  Our 60” round tables and chairs are provided for seating up to 130. **$600 (4hrs)  $250 Security/Damage Deposit. The Cord Banquet Room is the newest addition to the Museum property.  This 15,000 sq. ft. room, located directly behind the Museum, includes many of the same amenities as the Duesenberg.  Amenities include a sound system, stage, recessed lighting, dance floor, and flat-screen televisions.  This room provides seating for up to 900 at tables or 1,500 using a theater seating layout.  **$3,500 + options  Security/Damage Deposit $500 Two Other Locations The Lafayette Banquet Room is conveniently located at 3550 Mahan Drive.  This beautiful 6,500 sq. ft. room includes a kitchen, dance floor and wood tables and chairs for seating up to 200.  **$1,200 full day, *$800 ½ day (6 hrs) Security/Damage Deposit $250 Cross Creek Banquet Room at the Cross Creek Golf Course,is located at 6701 Mahan Drive near I-10 is 5,000 sq. ft. with a 2,500 square foot balcony overlooking the golf course.  Amenities include kitchen, 60” round tables, chairs to seat up to 250 and a dance floor. **$1,500 full day, *$900 ½ day (6 hrs) Security/Damage Deposit $250

Contact us

For more information and pricing on these rooms, please call Mary Graddick, (850) 942-0137 or email at tacm2000@gmail.com ** Prices subject to change and all charges are subject to FL sales tax. *1/2 day price not available on Saturday. .entry-content #post-94 Event Venues .entry-header Are you looking for a special and unique location for your meeting, conference or reception? We have been hosting events for over 20 years. With 2 banquet rooms to choose from, we have everything you need.
Cord Banquet Hall
Cross Creek Banquet Room
Duesenberg Banquet Hall Tucker Banquet Room
The Auburn Banquet Room
The Lafayette Banquet Room

The Cord Banquet Room is the newest addition to the Museum property.  This 15,000 sq. ft. room, located directly behind the Museum, includes many of the same amenities as the Duesenberg.  Amenities include a sound system, stage, recessed lighting, dance floor, and flat-screen televisions.  This room provides seating for up to 900 at tables or 1,500 using a theater seating layout.  **$3,500 + options  Security/Damage Deposit $500 Two Other Locations The Lafayette Banquet Room is conveniently located at 3550 Mahan Drive.  This beautiful 6,500 sq. ft. room includes a kitchen, dance floor and wood tables and chairs for seating up to 200.  **$1,200 full day, *$800 ½ day (6 hrs) Security/Damage Deposit $250 Cross Creek Banquet Room at the Cross Creek Golf Course,is located at 6701 Mahan Drive near I-10 is 5,000 sq. ft. with a 2,500 square foot balcony overlooking the golf course.  Amenities include kitchen, 60” round tables, chairs to seat up to 250 and a dance floor. **$1,500 full day, *$900 ½ day (6 hrs) Security/Damage Deposit $250

Contact us

For more information and pricing on these rooms, please call Mary Graddick, (850) 942-0137 or email at tacm2000@gmail.com ** Prices subject to change and all charges are subject to FL sales tax. *1/2 day price not available on Saturday. .entry-content

Tallahassee, Florida 32308
Call Us
